data.text: @heatherdcoleman @radical_ranger1 Only UCP members will get through or staffers does anyone actually think Merlin would get through to talk to Jason Kenney this a compete setup to help Kenney keep his job backed by 770 & 630 Fascist Radio in Alberta
@MerlinofCanada @radical_ranger1 I’m not even going to try to call in to Kenney’s dog and pony show. His voice makes me cringe

@radical_ranger1 @heatherdcoleman You will not get in I am betting staffers will be given access and they will have scripted questions to ask nothing embarrassing I am sure This is how 770 / 630 help Kenney keep his job FFS
@radical_ranger1 @MerlinofCanada Surprise. Don’t think we’ll get through to Kenney’s morning show. https://t.co/wgoq4G0LPG
@heatherdcoleman @MerlinofCanada Sadly true! Maybe we can blitz his new radio show with questions about it! If we can’t get through we can start making a lot of noise about that too!
@DrAGrace_cyhtt @heatherdcoleman I know so many people suffering
